snippet: International aid can help, but the country’s leaders still have to end wasteful subsidies and find ways to raise exports.
abstract: Editorial warns international efforts to provide financial aid to Ukraine will help only if the country's new leaders are willing to end bad policies and take steps to increase exports; holds while there is no question that Ukraine's new leaders will find it politically difficult to make necessary changes, there is no other way to get the economy back on its feet.
lead_paragraph: International aid can help, but the country’s leaders still have to end wasteful subsidies and find ways to raise exports.
